projects.title: Hustle OS - Personal Project Management System
projects.description: AI-native business management app with eight integrated modules covering the full end-to-end business workflow -- CRM, proposals, projects, timesheets, invoicing, expenses, contracts, and reports. One data model connects leads to invoices to financial reports. Eight Claude Code skill files let an AI agent operate the entire business through natural language.
highlights: 8 modules sharing one PostgreSQL database: lead flows into client, client into project, project into timesheets, timesheets into invoices, invoices into reports
Proposal-to-invoice conversion: one-time items, milestone phases, and recurring schedules created in a single atomic transaction
Dual interface: web dashboard and CLI calling identical core functions in src/core/
AI email drafting (Claude/OpenAI) for invoices, proposals, and contracts with mandatory human review before send
Documenso e-signing: contract PDF upload, signature field placement, webhook-driven status tracking on sign.weeai.dev
AI-native: 8 Claude Code skill files let an AI agent create invoices, manage pipeline, log expenses, and run reports through natural language
Self-hosted on $1.55/month VPS via Cloudflare Tunnel and Zero Trust -- no nginx, no inbound ports

projects.title: AiMod - Agentic AI DataOps & MLOps Platform
projects.description: End-to-end self-serve AI platform with 15+ LangGraph agents that automate data ingestion, transformation, ML model training, and on-demand analytics. Features a natural language interface that converts questions into SQL, charts, and narrative explanations through a multi-agent decision routing system.
highlights: 9 Python microservices behind Traefik reverse proxy
15+ LangGraph agents with 18 independently-configured LLM instances
Visual drag-and-drop pipeline builder (ReactFlow) with AI-assisted DAG construction
Natural language to SQL, charts, and explanations via multi-agent Decision Agent
Full data lakehouse: Spark, Flink, Kafka, Trino, Delta Lake, Airflow, dbt
Human-in-the-loop approval gates in pipeline workflows
~80% estimated improvement in MLOps efficiency
projects.role: Led product vision, architecture, LLM agent system, frontend, and MLOps pipeline

projects.title: AI Document Processing Platform
projects.description: Enterprise SaaS for AI-powered document intelligence with dual-mode adaptive RAG. Agentic LangGraph pipelines mimic how human analysts work: search for content, flip to specific pages for visual analysis, reflect on coverage, then extract with confidence scores and source citations.
highlights: 3 LangGraph agentic pipelines: extraction (v1 + v2), Q&A with VLM tool use, precision document comparison
Dual-mode RAG: fast passive retrieval vs self-correcting agentic workflows
On-demand Vision Language Model integration for scanned/complex documents
Per-field confidence scores (0.0-1.0) with source page citations and inline editing
Multi-tenant with RBAC, per-user token quotas, and admin-configurable LLM providers
5-10x faster analysis compared to manual analyst review
25+ database models, 7 document processing features, 6 format parsers
projects.role: Full-stack development of backend AI pipelines, frontend, and platform architecture

projects.title: Sentinel - AI Guardrails Middleware
projects.description: Stateless middleware that protects LLM applications with a progressive 5-layer input guard and 4-layer output guard. Uses a fast-first architecture: regex at ~2ms catches obvious attacks, BERT at ~150ms handles semantic threats, and LLM judge at ~2s resolves edge cases -- keeping median latency low.
highlights: 5-layer input guard: URL filter, 16 regex patterns, BERT prompt-injection classifier, LLM judge, intent scope gatekeeper
4-layer output guard: canary token leak detection, persona enforcement, BERT + topic classifier (parallel), LLM judge with auto-regeneration
Progressive performance tiers: ~2ms -> ~150ms -> ~2s escalation path
Hot-reloadable YAML policies without container restart
Canary token as cryptographic trip-wire for system prompt leakage
Output regeneration loop: violations get corrected responses instead of hard blocks
projects.role: Full design and implementation of the multi-layer guardrail architecture

projects.title: Credit Risk ML Models & Data Warehouse
projects.description: Income estimation model (MAPE ~25%) and loan screening model (AUC 0.75) built on millions of national credit records. Includes a 6TB PostgreSQL data warehouse with daily ETL replication and an internal MLOps platform prototype with automated feature selection.
highlights: Income Estimation model with ~25% MAPE on national credit data
Loan Screening model achieving 0.75 AUC using XGBoost
6TB PostgreSQL data warehouse with millions of credit records
Daily ETL replication from central bureau data and web scraping jobs on Apache Airflow
MLOps platform prototype with Feast feature store for on-demand model retraining
FastAPI model serving endpoints containerized with Docker
projects.role: Data Scientist - end-to-end ML pipeline from data warehouse to model serving

projects.title: E-Commerce Monitoring Bot
projects.description: Telegram bot that monitors Shopee Malaysia for price drops, stock changes, and new listings using a CDP capture-and-replay technique. Drives a real Chrome browser to intercept Shopee's internal API calls, then replays them server-side with live session cookies to bypass anti-bot detection.
highlights: CDP capture-and-replay: intercepts Shopee's internal API calls via Chrome DevTools Protocol
Replays captured requests with live browser cookies using subprocess curl
Tracks shop listing counts, product stock, pricing, and listing status changes
Multi-region support: Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, Philippines
11 Telegram commands with admin-only management and live config mutation
Critical alert system: 3x repeated notifications for delistings and restocks

projects.title: SMTP Relay Infrastructure & VPS Toolkit
projects.description: Two-tier email relay system replacing 60+ manually-rotated Gmail accounts for a debt collection agency. Tier A uses Postfix with a custom Python round-robin daemon for automatic Gmail account rotation. Accompanied by a reusable 8-role Ansible VPS provisioning toolkit with security hardening.
highlights: Custom Python TCP table server implementing Postfix round-robin sender rotation
Systemd-hardened daemon with file-locked persistent counter
8-role Ansible VPS toolkit: common, ssh_hardening, fail2ban, docker, watchdog, healthcheck, monitoring, firewall
Two-layer health monitoring: generic VPS checks + Postfix-specific queue drain detection
Documented incident recovery: fail2ban Restore Ban bypass, UFW ordering
Tier B Postal upgrade path with 21-day IP warm-up schedule and DMARC graduation

projects.title: Sales, Billing & E-Invoicing System
projects.description: Full-stack serverless business management system for an SME equipment company. Covers sales CRM, invoicing, test weight rental management with automated overdue detection, mobile signature capture via JWT-secured links, purchase order tracking with delivery variance detection, and LHDN MyInvois e-invoicing compliance.
highlights: Serverless on AWS: Lambda + DynamoDB + S3 + API Gateway (~RM50/month)
12 DynamoDB tables with GSIs, fully defined in Terraform IaC
Mobile signature capture: JWT-secured links (24h expiry) with canvas-based signing, S3 storage with 7-year retention
Equipment rental management: check-out/check-in workflow, automated daily overdue detection via CloudWatch
Purchase order tracking with partial delivery recording and variance detection
Malaysian LHDN MyInvois e-invoicing integration (UBL 2.1 JSON format)
GitHub Actions CI/CD with pylint, black, mypy, pytest, bandit security scans

projects.title: Event Ticketing & Check-in Platform
projects.description: Full-stack ticketing platform with integrated payment processing (Billplz), QR code ticket generation, dual check-in flows (staff scanner + self-service), and admin analytics dashboard. Features privacy-first NRIC handling with SHA-256 hashing and HMAC-verified payment webhooks.
highlights: Billplz payment integration with HMAC-SHA256 webhook verification and idempotent processing
JWT-signed QR tickets with dual check-in: staff camera/barcode scanner + 4-step self-service portal
Privacy-first: NRIC stored as SHA-256 hash with salt, only last 4 digits in plaintext
Tiered pricing phases (early bird, regular, door) with per-tier capacity management
Admin dashboard with revenue charts, tier breakdowns, check-in progress rings, CSV exports
Rate limiting (10 orders/min, 30 check-ins/min per IP)
Docker Compose deployment with PostgreSQL, Nginx reverse proxy, Let's Encrypt SSL, auto-migrations
